Paragraph: Highly soluble poly[quinacridone-alt-benzothiadiazole] ( PQCDTB ) has been synthesized through the Suzuki coupling reaction by introducing planar quinacridone and highly absorbing benzothiadiazole.

The entities "Highly soluble", "Poly[quinacridone-alt-benzothiadiazole] (PQCDTB)", "Planar quinacridone", and "Benzothiadiazole" are valid entities as they clearly refer to material properties or the material itself.

The entity "synthesized through the Suzuki coupling reaction" does not refer to a material property and is therefore not a valid entity for this table.
